meanings.definition: The act of removing sacred qualities or characteristics from something.
meanings.sent1: The desacralizations of the ancient temple left it feeling empty and devoid of meaning.
meanings.sent2: The desacralizations of the church were met with mixed reactions from the community.
meanings.sent3: The desacralizations of the sacred artifact turned it into just another ordinary object.
meanings.sent4: Her desacralizations of the traditional ceremony shocked the attendees.
meanings.sent5: The desacralizations of the ritual stripped away its mystical aura.

meanings.definition: The process of making something less sacred or holy.
meanings.sent1: Over time, the desacralizations of the sacred site led to its decline in significance.
meanings.sent2: The desacralizations of the ceremony made it lose its spiritual impact.
meanings.sent3: The desacralizations of the holy relic turned it into a mere trinket.
meanings.sent4: The desacralizations of the sacred text made it lose its power over believers.
meanings.sent5: The desacralizations of the tradition made it lose its sense of reverence.
